comment: Bumping rating with another pour. This is drinking fabulously.
Love to revisit this every now and then. One of my favorite high-rye mashbills.
Still dig this, though the rye spice is coming out in spades now. Pairs well with V for Vendetta.
Pairs quite nicely with Ken Burns’ Country Music :)
Complex and tasty 10-year. Leather boots, barrel, cherries, rye spice, and that slight “Southern Star funk”. My favorite of their lineup (the 3 I’ve had). @Zslug @jdjmad @OtisDB @Kyle-Metes-Randolph
10 Yr MGP and smells and tastes like it. Solid stuff
